action.name: Multiattack
entries: The scorpion makes two Claw attacks and one Sting attack.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 5}, reach 5 ft. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) Bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the {@condition Grappled|XPHB} condition (escape {@dc 13}) from one of two claws.

action.name: Sting
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 5}, reach 5 ft. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) Piercing damage plus 11 ({@damage 2d10}) Poison damage.
